entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is described as a normal boy who doesn't care about the news and is unaware of current events.

entities.name: aunt petunia
entities.description: Aunt Petunia is mentioned as scolding Vernon to be quiet because the window is open.

entities.name: vernon
entities.description: Vernon is described as being reprimanded by Aunt Petunia for making noise.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as listening to a jingle and watching Mrs. Figg from behind a bush.

entities.name: mrs figg
entities.description: Mrs. Figg is described as a batty, cat-loving old lady who has recently taken to asking Harry around for tea.

entities.name: prime minister
entities.description: The Prime Minister is mentioned as someone Dudley may not know about.

relationships.description: Harry has an interest in Mrs. Figg, as evidenced by his watching her from behind a bush.
Vernon is reprimanded by Aunt Petunia for making noise.
